page.syntax: C copy.run_silent(C layoutname [,C filter [,C order [,* arguments ]]])

argument.name: layoutname
argument.description: The name of a previously created copy operation.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records to copy.

argument.name: order
argument.description: Optional. Default = record order. A character order expression that sorts selected records.

page.description: Runs a Copy operation without displaying any prompts
page.discussion: The COPY.RUN_SILENT() method copies data using a previously defined copy operation, but without user interaction. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
